title: Multiplying Polynomials Challenge
description: Master the art of multiplying various forms of polynomials.

questions.question: Expand and simplify: $(x + y)(x^2 - xy + y^2)$
Expand and simplify: $(a - b)(a^2 + ab + b^2)$
Simplify: $(x + y)(x - y)(x^2 + xy + y^2)(x^2 - xy + y^2)$
Simplify: $(x + y + z)(x^2 + y^2 + z^2 - xy - xz - yz)$
Simplify: $(a^4 - a^3b + a^2b^2 - ab^3 + b^4)(a + b)$
Simplify: $(x + y)(x^4 - x^3y + x^2y^2 - xy^3 + y^4)$
Simplify: $(x + y - z)(x^2 + y^2 + z^2 - xy + xz + yz)$
Simplify: $(x + 1)(x^{n-1} - x^{n-2} + ... - x + 1)$ when n is even
Simplify: $(a + b)(a^2 - ab + b^2)(a^6 - a^3b^3 + b^6)$
